resources.string:
Cadpage will default to using GPS coordinates to map locations for districts where dispatch centers routinely supply GPS coordiantes for most calls. This is a mixed blessing. GPS mapped locations are more reliable but not always as accurate as calls mapped by their street address. There is a new GPS Mapping Option in Additional settings that can be used to override this default telling Cadpage to always use stree address mapping or to use GPS coordiate mapping any time GPS coordiantes are available
 
 New GPS Mapping Locations:
 El Dorado County, CA
 Calveras County, CA
 Mendicino County, CA
 Napa County, CA
 Middlesex County, CT
 New Castle County, DE
 Midland County, MI
 Blair County, PA
 
 New Locations:
 La Porte, TX renamed from Nassau Bay, TX
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Golden, CO
 Whhitfield County, GA
 Muskegon County, MI
 Greene County, MO
 Erie County, NY
 Montgomery County, NY
 Nassau County, NY
 Brunswick County, NC
 Polk County, NC
 Summit County, OH
 Jackson County, OR
 Klamath County, OR
 Delaware County, PA
 Northampton County, PA
 Cabell County, WV
